messages.message: In case anyone wants to take a look, I've started to create a document for specific development/execution processes during POCs. It's still pretty barebones but is an attempt to at least structure some of the branching, demoing, and task organization. Feel free to add comments!

General idea is that we improve the process of getting tasks from customers, avoid unstable pushes to master and demo servers, and then make sure that there is a handoff / productionization process post-POC
Thanks Aaron for the proposal. I'll review this weekend. Shaunak and I also had some conversations about customer / eng delivery process that id like to share
This is really good. Do you want to start trying out the branch strategy youâ€™re proposing w Citi?
